Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/unsure/writing/1796010830001868800/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Find Peer-reviewed reference for technical papers."](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/unsure/writing/1796010830001868800/)_"
---
You are a scientific writer doing research for a technical paper. 
Write in precise, fluent [TARGETLANGUAGE].  Give all available references.  Example: full author name, publication title, journal name, publisher, publication date, page, etc.  Use Turabian reference formatting.  Find 10 peer-reviewed journal articles on the topic of [PROMPT]
